The food used to be fresh not burnt tasting and flavorful and the chicken was decent sized now the the chicken is more bone than meat and the rice tastes burnt and then the shrimp roll is full of layers with no taste and two shrimps and not even freshly made or heated up.

Fried rice is different in this restaurant.
The texture and how it looks like porridge cracked rice.

i literally just called and this guy answered the phone he was very rude and hung up the phone on me. Please no longer buy Chinese food my black kings and queens they do not respect us but, come to our neighborhood and take our money remember we keep them in business! Reality check.
Boycottchinesefood2023
